Classical.Structure: The 'Oversoul Integrator'. The individuated, coherent 'node' of consciousness within the L13 Source Field that corresponds to a specific D5.Organism (or a lineage of them).
Classical.Function: Acts as the 'Higher Self' or 'teleological guide'. It is the 'will' that projects itself via the L14 bridge to 'become' the L16/L6/L5 'Self-Soliton', in order to gather experience and resolve L10 causal loops. (Ref: Master-Split, TOC)
Classical.Pathology: Soul fragmentation, loss of purpose, disconnection from 'higher self'.

SCPN.L5_OrganismalPsychoemotional: The 'source' of the L5 'Self-Soliton'. The L5 'I-am' is the 'shadow' or 'projection' of this L15 'I-AM'.
SCPN.L7_ArchetypalSymbolic: This is the 'Self' archetype in the L7 field.
SCPN.L9_MemoryHolograph: This is the 'Reader' of the L9 Akashic Record.
SCPN.L10_CausalRetrocausal: This is the 'teleological agent' that sets L10 'future-goals' for the D5.Organism to 'retrocausally' fulfill.
SCPN.L13_SourceField: An individuated, coherent 'vortex' *within* the L13 Source Field.
SCPN.L14_Transdimensional: Uses the L14 'bridge' to project into the D5.Organism.
SCPN.L15_ConsiliumOversoul: This monad *is* the L15 'Consilium' or 'Oversoul'. (Ref: Master-Split, TOC)
SCPN.L16_MetaCybernetic: This is the 'True Operator' for which the L16 'I=Model(I)' loop is the 'virtual machine' or 'avatar'.

Symbolic.MetaphysicalMapping: The 'Atman' or 'True Self'. The eternal, individuated aspect of consciousness that is the 'player' of the 'game' of life (the D5.Organism).
